org.apache.datasketches.memory

Class UnsafeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.datasketches.memory.UnsafeUtil

  • public final class UnsafeUtil
extends Object
    Provides access to the sun.misc.Unsafe class and its key static fields.
    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

    • Method Detail

      • assertBounds

        public static void assertBounds(long reqOff,
                                long reqLen,
                                long allocSize)
        Assert the requested offset and length against the allocated size. The invariants equation is: 0 <= reqOff <= reqLen <= reqOff + reqLen <= allocSize. If this equation is violated and assertions are enabled, an AssertionError will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        reqOff - the requested offset
        reqLen - the requested length
        allocSize - the allocated size.

      • checkBounds

        public static void checkBounds(long reqOff,
                               long reqLen,
                               long allocSize)
        Check the requested offset and length against the allocated size. The invariants equation is: 0 <= reqOff <= reqLen <= reqOff + reqLen <= allocSize. If this equation is violated an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        reqOff - the requested offset
        reqLen - the requested length
        allocSize - the allocated size.
